description:
Detective Simulator | Murder at Silver Weed Groceries

A light detective simulator, where it's your job to identify the murderer at Silver Weed Groceries.

The aim of this game is to use the information at your fingertips to identify the killer. Once you think you know who performed the murder approach the phone, press ‘E’ and type the full name of the suspect. 

When approaching other objects around your office, press ‘E’ and use ‘esc’ to return back when finished. 

Use 'E' when approaching an object to gain some information about the case. Use 'esc' to leave that object. When you are certain of the murderer approach the telephone and enter their name.

Note: For some reason, audio doesn't work in the HTML5 version, why not listen to an LA Noir playlist as you play?
